reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable with pockets and appreciate its fit, with one mentioning it accommodates a growing belly well. The style receives positive feedback for its floral design and beautiful print, while the length and sizing are appropriate. Customers like the soft fabric and vibrant colors that match the product photos. The fabric quality receives mixed reviews, with some customers loving the material

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfortable!! Cute!!!!
items.body: I LOVE THIS DRESS!!! I bought it to go on my trip to Florida and I wore it every single day! It is so comfortable, it is super cute, it has pockets, the length is really good and it has these cute little slits on the sides that don’t go up too high, but just high enough that you feel cute! The fabric is very soft, the dress itself is very sturdy, and I even wear it with leggings. I wore it when we were flying home, it’s so comfortable. I wore it on the airplane. I will probably buy a couple more of these! I got the blue and white flower one. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfortable
items.body: Beautiful dress ! Soft flowy material and it fits true to size. Not too long which I was concerned about as I’m 5’2” size large. Just right. Read more
items.author: ATG

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute, comfy, soft, stretchy…Oh, POCKETS!!!
items.body: I’m 5’4”, 42DD, 195 and I ordered the Floral Bohemian print in an XL. It fits great and the color is vibrant. The dress is soft and has stretch but it just lays nicely over my body. Not clingy at all, but more on the flowy side. The V neck is perfect, not a plunging neckline, it’s modest imo, which I really like. I do not like my cleavage showing and it does not show with this dress. I took one star off due to the side splits being too high. The splits come about 1 1/2 inches above my knee so when I sit and cross my legs, I’m constantly pulling the dress to make sure my thighs are covered. This is an inexpensive dress that is more casual but with certain prints or solids, you can definitely dress these up for special occasions. The quality seems good and at a fair price. Find your size and a color/print you like and have some fun in thus comfy flowy dress. Read more
items.author: Cat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and comfortable
items.body: Very well made, deep black color, full length (I’m 5’2”). Side slits allow for freedom of movement. Flows nicely, perfect weight for summer. I wish there were more patterns in a smaller print. I would easily order a dozen for summer. Perfect summer dress! Read more
items.author: Sunny Sideup

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Versatile Dress
items.body: I was impressed with the weight of the fabric of this dress. It is not thin or see through and doesn't stick to the body like thinner fabrics do. The color was true to the picture. I was also pleasantly surprised with the pockets. Normally side pockets on the hips can be bulky looking but because of the styling of the dress and the fabric, they are barely noticeable. The v-neck isn't revealing but shows enough skin to be able to display a necklace. I also like that the shoulder isn't narrow - definitely good bra coverage. The dress is a smidge long for me without shoes at 5'5" - almost touches my feet. But it would fine with even a small heel and would be great for taller gals. I bought this for a tropical vacation and I think it will work well as a coverup around the resort and also an option for going to dinner with sandals and a nice necklace. Recommend! Read more
items.author: All About Books

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Loved the print & fabric
items.body: The fabrics & print is great. The side seam on one side where the slit starts is stitched incorrectly. The pockets stick out because they do not lay flat. I’m 5’4”, 138 lbs & I purchased a medium. The length didn’t look good on me. It fit well above the waist, however from the waist down the dress becomes wider & is too much fabric for me. I tried it with a belt but that didn’t look so great either. I will be returning & continue looking for a cute sundress. Hopefully it will fit others better than me. Read more
items.author: KDJ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The “Ideal” maxi dress.
items.body: Really thrilled with this maxi casual dress which is SO comfortable for wearing in hot weather. It fits true to size in a large (for reference purposes I’m 5’8” tall weighing about 155 pounds). I find the dress extremely flattering ………..not too tight but also not too loose either. I’m impressed with the vibrant color patterns and have ordered more than one dress due to them being so comfortable, fitting well and being perfect for not just summer but for year round because of living in a warm climate. The colors of the dresses and the patterns are all attractive and I’ve received compliments from people I don’t know who have said to me how pretty they are. I like how the dress has 2 side slits at the bottom giving a unique look and the 2 pockets are great too. Very important is the fact these dresses are a terrific value cost wise - another reason I’ve more than one of them. I liked that the dresses were reasonably affordable. These maxi dresses can be dressed up or not depending on foot ware - high heels versus flip flops and what jewelry is worn. Overall, I’m totally delighted with these dresses and highly recommend them! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress for summer!
items.body: Love this dress. I'm 5'6" 130 lbs medium fits perfectly. Very comfortable. Read more
items.author: CA Shopper

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Floral Navy Blue, Floral Boho Ethnic Style, Floral Green Wave Point, Blue, Floral Blue and White Porcelain, Graded Pink Orange, Floral Blue, Floral Blue Orange, Army Green, Hot Pink, Black, Floral Red Flowers, Floral Palm Leaf, Floral Pink Oil Painting. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
